summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nazca360 virtual tourism platform. Backend APIs working correctly (89.5% success rate), frontend navigation and core features functional. Premium content filtering working as designed. Main issue: calendar component not showing future dates.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 status instead of expected 307 redirect
Returns 200 status instead of expected 201 for creation
minor_issues.impact: Reservation created successfully but wrong status code

ui_bugs.issue: No future dates available for selection

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and navigation
Gallery shows videos with category filtering (all, nasca, palpa, museum)
Free videos accessible without authentication (2 videos showing)
Premium videos correctly hidden for non-authenticated users (3 premium videos in database)
Subscription page shows Basic (free) and Premium ($29.99/a√±o) plans
Authentication redirects to Emergent Auth correctly
Protected routes (Dashboard, Admin) redirect unauthenticated users
Navigation between pages works without errors
Backend API endpoints responding correctly (17/19 tests passed)
Reservation booking form and calendar component load
Admin panel access restricted to admin users
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix calendar component to show future dates for reservation booking. The calendar is currently not displaying selectable future dates, preventing users from completing VR cabin reservations.
